name: Samurai Journey
description:
game introduction
"Samurai Journey" is an adventure game. The game has a well-designed plot, rich level design and unexpected little eggs.

Game Features

⚪The combat system of "Samurai Journey" is based on rhythm, avoiding enemy attacks, mastering the rhythm to counterattack, and also avoiding obstacles in the map.

⚪ We have designed a wealth of decryption levels and battle levels, allowing you to experience different pleasures.

⚪ Give full play to your abilities: When you first get started, you may feel a little difficult. Master the rhythm and patterns, avoid obstacles and defeat the enemy, and regain your own music.

⚪ The movement of the samurai is closely related to the rhythm. There are various obstacles and monsters along the way. We need to avoid them and defeat them to pass the level!
